name: Trolley Doglem
description:
You're trying to have fun in the woods with your dog, however, forces unknown beckon you to do bad things. Will you give in to temptation?

Basically, this is a 5 minute little game where you can explore the woods and play with your dog while you are repeatedly prompted to make choices that could affect the future of yourself and your companion

Features:
- Play fetch with your dog

- Name your dog

- pet your dog

- Avoid the voices telling you to do bad things

- 9 (technically 8) different endings including secret endings not bound to the normal gameplay loop
